traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The killer frog can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The killer frog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The frog’s long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The killer frog makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
